page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content:
Home Life.
When I get home from school, I get changed and I have a game of football with my Dad, and a game of tennis with my sister. Then I ride my BMX bike and I play with my A_Team and Star-Wars toys.I usually have my dinner at 5.00pm. My favourite T.V.programmes are the A_Team, Street hawk and Knight Rider. I usually go to bed at 20.00hrs. I set my alarm for 07.00 in the morning. I get up and get dressed and have some breakfast and a drink. I then go up to the bus for 08.20. Sometimes we have Wents, Norfolks or Chambers coaches.
